Abs.description: Returns the absolute value of the input density.

FunctionForY.description: Y-dependent function defining the amplitude curve.

Reversed.description: Whether to reverse the anchor direction.

AnchorType.description: Enum discriminator for anchor evaluation types.

Angle.description: Outputs the angle between the sample direction and a reference vector.

Vector.description: Static reference vector for angle computation.

IsAxis.description: Whether the reference is treated as an axis.

Axis.description: Axial signed-distance field with curve-based falloff.

Curve.description: Falloff curve mapping distance to density.

IsAnchored.description: Whether the axis passes through the anchor position.

BaseHeight.description: Adjusts positions to the terrain base height.

Cache.description: Caches vector values from a child provider.

Ceiling.description: Matches positions on a ceiling surface.
Sub-pattern to match on the ceiling.

Cell.description: CellNoise implementation variant for internal cell-based noise generation.

ReturnType.description: Specifies which distance value to return (F1, F2, F2-F1, etc.).
Specifies which distance value to return (F1, F2, F2-F1, etc.).

CellType.description: Enum discriminator for CellNoise cell computation types.

CellValue.description: Returns a hash value associated with the nearest cell point.

CellWallDistance.description: Returns the distance to the nearest biome cell wall.

Clamp.description: Clamps a curve between two wall values.

Cube.description: Axis-aligned cube signed-distance field shaped by a curve.

Curve.description: Falloff curve mapping distance to density.

Cuboid.description: Matches positions within a cuboid region with an optional sub-pattern.

SubPattern.description: Optional sub-pattern to apply within the cuboid.

CurveMapper.description: Remaps input density through a curve asset lookup.

Curve.description: Reference to the CurveAsset used for remapping.

Cylinder.description: Cylindrical signed-distance field with independent radial and axial curves.

Spin.description: Rotation angle around the cylinder axis in degrees.

DecimalConstants.description: Provides a collection of named constant decimal values.

Values.description: Map of named decimal constant values.

Distance.description: Spherical signed-distance field shaped by a curve.

Curve.description: Falloff curve mapping distance to density.

Distance2.description: Two-distance computation base for cell noise return types.

Distance2Add.description: Returns the sum of F1 and F2 cell distances.

Distance2Div.description: Returns the quotient of F1 and F2 cell distances.

Distance2Mul.description: Returns the product of F1 and F2 cell distances.

Distance2Sub.description: Returns the difference of F2 and F1 cell distances.

DistanceToBiomeEdge.description: Returns the distance to the nearest biome edge.

Ellipsoid.description: Ellipsoidal signed-distance field with configurable orientation and scale.

Curve.description: Falloff curve mapping normalized distance to density.

NewYAxis.description: The new Y (up) axis for orientation.

Spin.description: Rotation angle around the new Y axis in degrees.

Euclidean.description: Euclidean (straight-line) distance function for cell noise.

Exported.description: Exports a vector provider for external use.

SingleInstance.description: Whether only one instance is allowed.

FastGradientWarp.description: High-performance domain warping using built-in noise derivatives.

WarpScale.description: Base frequency of the warp noise.

WarpOctaves.description: Number of octaves for the warp noise.

Is2D.description: When true, warping is computed in 2D (XZ plane only).

Floor.description: Matches positions on a floor surface.
Sub-pattern to match on the floor.

Gradient.description: Computes the gradient magnitude of the input density along a specified axis.

Axis.description: Direction along which to compute the gradient.

GradientWarp.description: Warps a density field along its own gradient direction.

SampleRange.description: Finite-difference step size for gradient estimation.

2D.description: Whether to restrict warping to the XZ plane.

YFor2D.description: Fixed Y level for 2D gradient sampling.

Imported.description: References an externally defined vector provider by name.

Name.description: Name of the imported vector provider asset.

LineType.description: Enum discriminator for line distance computation types.

Manhattan.description: Manhattan (axis-aligned) distance function for cell noise.

Max.description: Returns the maximum of multiple curves.

Curves.description: Array of curves to take the maximum of.

Min.description: Returns the minimum of multiple curves.

Curves.description: Array of curves to take the minimum of.

Mix.description: Linearly interpolates between two density inputs using a factor.

MultiMix.description: Blends between multiple density inputs using keyed interpolation.

Keys.description: Key values for each input density.

Curves.description: Array of curve assets to multiply.

NoiseType.description: Base noise type discriminator for noise function selection.

Normalizer.description: Linearly remaps input density from one range to another.

Offset.description: Offsets a prop by a fixed amount.

ParentDistanceType.description: Parent distance computation type for branch noise.

ParentType.description: Parent cell type enum for branch noise configurations.

Pipeline.description: Composes multiple density stages into a sequential processing pipeline.

Plane.description: Planar signed-distance field with curve-based falloff.

Curve.description: Falloff curve mapping signed distance to density.

IsAnchored.description: Whether the plane passes through the anchor position.

PositionsPinch.description: Applies a pinch transform to positions-based density sampling.

PositionsTwist.description: Applies a twist transform to positions-based density sampling.

Pow.description: Raises the input density to a given exponent.

Exponent.description: The power to raise the input to.

Rotator.description: Rotates sampling coordinates by redefining the Y axis and applying a spin angle.

NewYAxis.description: The new Y (up) axis direction vector.

SpinAngle.description: Rotation angle around the new Y axis in degrees.

Scale.description: Scales the sampling coordinates before evaluating the child density.

Shell.description: Shell-shaped SDF defined by angle and distance curves.

Axis.description: Reference axis direction for angle computation.

Mirror.description: Whether to mirror the shell across the axis plane.

Simplex.description: SimplexNoise implementation variant for internal simplex-based noise generation.

Octaves.description: Number of noise layers to sum.

SimplexNoise2D.description: 2D simplex noise with fractal Brownian motion (fBm) octave stacking.

Octaves.description: Number of noise layers to sum.

SimplexNoise3D.description: 3D simplex noise with fractal Brownian motion (fBm) octave stacking.

Octaves.description: Number of noise layers to sum.

Slider.description: Translates the sampling coordinates before evaluating the child density.

SmoothCeiling.description: Smoothly caps a curve at a maximum value.

SmoothClamp.description: Smoothly clamps a curve between two wall values.

SmoothFloor.description: Smoothly floors a curve at a minimum value.

SmoothMax.description: Returns the smooth maximum of two curves.

SmoothMin.description: Returns the smooth minimum of two curves.

Sqrt.description: Computes the square root of the input density.

Curves.description: Array of curve assets to sum.

Switch.description: Selects between density inputs based on switch cases.

SwitchCases.description: Array of case definitions mapping conditions to inputs.

SwitchState.description: Provides a state value for use with Switch nodes.
The state string to match against.

Terrain.description: Accesses the current terrain density from the worldgen context.

Type.description: Generic type discriminator for polymorphic configuration blocks.

VectorWarp.description: Warps a density field along a specified vector direction.

WarpVector.description: Direction and base magnitude of the warp displacement.

XOverride.description: Overrides the X coordinate with a fixed value before sampling the child density.

Value.description: The constant X coordinate to use.

XValue.description: Outputs the X coordinate of the sample position as a density value.

YOverride.description: Overrides the Y coordinate with a fixed value before sampling the child density.

Value.description: The constant Y coordinate to use.

YSampled.description: Samples the child density at discrete Y intervals and interpolates.

SampleOffset.description: Vertical offset for the sample grid.

YValue.description: Outputs the Y coordinate of the sample position as a density value.

ZOverride.description: Overrides the Z coordinate with a fixed value before sampling the child density.

Value.description: The constant Z coordinate to use.

Range.description: The effective range of the distance falloff.

ExponentA.description: The exponent controlling the falloff rate.

DistanceS.description: An S-shaped distance curve with configurable transition.

Range.description: The effective range of the curve.

Manual.description: A manually defined curve using explicit control points.

Points.description: Array of X,Y control points defining the curve.

AlwaysTrueCondition.description: A condition that always evaluates to true.

Conditions.description: Array of conditions to AND together.

Thickness.description: The constant thickness of the layer in blocks.

Material.description: The material provider for this layer.

DownwardSpace.description: Applies material based on downward air space.

Space.description: The downward air space in blocks.

Value.description: The target value for equality comparison.

ThicknessFunctionXZ.description: Density function controlling thickness in XZ.

Material.description: The material provider for this layer.

Conditions.description: Array of conditions to OR together.

RangeThickness.description: A layer with random thickness within a range.

RangeY.description: The Y range to constrain positions to.

UpwardDepth.description: Applies material based on upward depth.

UpwardSpace.description: Applies material based on upward air space.

Weighted.description: Selects an assignment via weighted random selection.

Material.description: The material provider for this layer.

Box.description: Fills a box region with blocks.

handleTypes.description: Scalar density value at (x, y, z)

connectionRules.sameCategory: Outputs can only connect to inputs of the same AssetCategory

Density.description: Functions that evaluate a scalar value at any (x, y, z) position. The backbone of terrain shape.

Curve.description: 1D functions mapping distance/parameter to a scalar. Used by shape primitives and material providers.

MaterialProvider.description: Determine which block material to place at each position. Converts density into blocks.

Pattern.description: Boolean predicates that test block positions for surface/adjacency/material conditions.

PositionProvider.description: Generate sets of (x, y, z) positions for prop placement within chunks.

PropProvider.description: Place structures, blocks, and prefabs at positions determined by the placement pipeline.

Scanner.description: Search vertically or areally for valid placement positions within a column or region.

Assignment.description: Map scanned positions to props. The final step in the placement pipeline.

VectorProvider.description: Produce 3D direction vectors, used by warping and angle density functions.

EnvironmentProvider.description: Assign environment settings (water tint, spawn density, weather) per region.

TintProvider.description: Assign block tint colors per region for foliage/water coloring.

BlockMask.description: Filter which blocks can be placed or replaced during prop placement.

Directionality.description: Determine rotation/facing for placed prefabs and props.

Framework.description: Named constant pools and position providers shared across the biome.

Biome.description: Top-level biome definition combining terrain, materials, props, and environment.

WorldStructure.description: Defines biome layout and distribution across the world.
